ROOT.request: tax_eq(4533) AND (instrument_model="HiSeq X Ten" OR instrument_model="HiSeq X Five" OR instrument_model="Illumina MiSeq" OR instrument_model="Illumina NovaSeq 6000" OR instrument_model="Illumina Genome Analyzer" OR instrument_model="Illumina Genome Analyzer II" OR instrument_model="Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiScanSQ" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiSeq 1000" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiSeq 1500" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiSeq 2000" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiSeq 2500" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiSeq 3000" OR instrument_model="Illumina HiSeq 4000" OR instrument_model="NextSeq 500" OR instrument_model="NextSeq 550" OR instrument_model="Ion Torrent Proton" OR instrument_model="Ion Torrent S5" OR instrument_model="Ion Torrent S5 XL")AND library_strategy="RNA-Seq" AND library_source="TRANSCRIPTOMIC"

PROJECT.center_name: The Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology

SUBMITTER_ID.namespace: The Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology

PROJECT.NAME: Oryza brachyantha
PROJECT.TITLE: Oryza brachyantha Genome sequencing and assembly
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Oryza brachyantha is a wild rice species that is found in central Africa. It is tufted, slender, distributed in central Africa, and usually lives on rocks or in shallow water. Oryza brachyantha is a phyletically basal species in the genus Oryza. The unique phylogenic position and compact genome make this species an excellent model for comparative genomic in this genus. We chose the commonly used accession IRGC101232 for genome sequencing.
